ComicInfo.Summary: After some arguments over Kevin's leadership and Kirby's independence, the heroes (Kevin, Kirby, and the Presbyter) go off to rescue Joe. They are attacked by frost pixies, hell-hounds, and a cyclops, but eventually make their way to the cross on top of Mount Royal. The Presbyter prays for the cross' illusion to be dispersed, and they see a set of stairs leading down into the earth.
